Columns.Name: PosDeviceId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a POS Device.

Columns.Name: PosDeviceName
Columns.Description: The name of a POS Device.

Columns.Name: PosDeviceDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a POS Device.

Columns.Name: PosDeviceSerialNumber
Columns.Description: The serial number of a POS device.

Columns.Name: ManufacturerSerialNumber
Columns.Description: The manufacturer's serial number of the Asset.

Columns.Name: OrganizationAssignedSerialNumber
Columns.Description: The serial number assigned to the Asset by the organization holding it.

Columns.Name: ElectronicSerialNumber
Columns.Description: The electronic serial number is a unique identification number embedded by manufacturers on a microchip in their product. While the ESN was first commonly used in wireless phones it has found traction in other electronic products.

Columns.Name: GlobalIndividualAssetIdentifier
Columns.Description: The Global Individual Asset Identifier (GIAI) is a simple tool used to identify an asset by type, uniquely where required. The GIAI is part of the GS1 system of standards.

Columns.Name: GlobalReturnableAssetIdentifier
Columns.Description:
The Global Returnable Asset Identifier (GRAI) was developed by GS1 to be used to identify assets by type. It can also be used to uniquely identify assets by including the serial number. 

The GRAI is used to identify Returnable Transport Items (RTI) such as pallets, roll container, crates. The GRAI identifies the type of returnable asset.

Columns.Name: PosDeviceInstalledTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the POS device was installed.

Columns.Name: PosDeviceTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a POS Device Type.

Columns.Name: PosDeviceNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the POS Device.

Columns.Name: AssetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Asset.
